import React from 'react' import { Menu, Icon, Search, Button, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Route } from 'react-router-dom' import Login from './components/Login' import Logout from './components/Logout' import './App.css'; import './images/userIcon.png'; const NavBar = ({currentUser, loggedIn}) => { return (
{loggedIn ? : } closeIcon> }
) } const mapStateToProps = ({currentUser}) => { return { currentUser, loggedIn: !!currentUser } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(NavBar);
